title: FS S81 Large Silk J  Evers Cubs
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: FS S81 Large Silk J  Evers Cubs
posts.post_content: Offered For Sale 1912 S81 silk of J Evers. I purchased this From REA Auctions a few years ago in the auction description it says it was at one time attached to another S81 I mention this but you can clearly see this is among the finest S81 silks surviving. it is very scarce and clearly one of the most significant Issues of the era. This Silk was clearly well cared for for the past 106 years. Asking $3500.00 Thank you for looking

[quote name="bigfanNY" post=1810788]Offered For Sale 1912 S81 silk of J Evers. I purchased this From REA Auctions a few years ago in the auction description it says it was at one time attached to another S81 I mention this but you can clearly see this is among the finest S81 silks surviving. it is very scarce and clearly one of the most significant Issues of the era. This Silk was clearly well cared for for the past 106 years. Asking $3500.00 Thank you for looking[/QUOTE]

Wow! That is the most vivid silk I've ever seen. Fantastic condition! GLWTS.
Bump With a thank you for for the compliments. It is a Great Item
Bump offering this Silk again dropping price..now $3,250.00. Net to me.
Offering this silk again Dropping price to $2800.00 net to me. Well under recent S81 sales.
